Improvements.Improvement: Use try-with-resources to automatically close resources
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- JobClient client=new JobClient(jobConf);
+ try (JobClient client=new JobClient(jobConf)) {
Improvements.Description: The JobClient object should be declared inside a try-with-resources statement. This ensures that the client is automatically closed after use and prevents potential resource leaks.
The magic numbers 10 and 0.9 should be extracted into constants to improve readability and maintainability of the code.

Instead of catching NumberFormatException and ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException separately, catch Exception as a general exception to handle any unexpected errors. Also, add the original exception to the output to aid in debugging.
